effect_entries.effect: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max [HP]{mechanic:hp}.  If the user is [switched out]{mechanic:switched-out}, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user's max HP.  If the user [faint]{mechanic:faint}s or is forcefully switched by []{move:roar} or []{move:whirlwind}, this effect will not activate.
effect_entries.short_effect: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.

effect_entries.effect: Heals replacement Pokémon by half of their max HP.
